sentences.en: Angela studied ballet for six years.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉学了六年芭蕾舞.

sentences.en: Ballet is the ultimate in human movement.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞在人类的动作中可谓优雅至极。

sentences.en: Have you ever seen a ballet before?
sentences.cn: 你曾看过芭蕾舞剧 吗 ?

sentences.en: He gets huge pleasure from ballet and contemporary dance.
sentences.cn: 他从芭蕾和现代舞中得到极大的快乐。

sentences.en: He rejoined Sadler's Wells Royal Ballet as Assistant Administrator in 1988.
sentences.cn: 他在1988年重回萨德勒的威尔斯皇家芭蕾舞团，任行政助理。

sentences.en: His previous girlfriend was a dancer with the Royal Ballet.
sentences.cn: 他的前女友是皇家芭蕾舞团的舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: Report has it that the ballet will visit England before long.
sentences.cn: 据说这个芭蕾舞团不久将访问英国.

sentences.en: She also narrated a documentary about the Kirov Ballet School.
sentences.cn: 她还为一部关于基洛夫芭蕾舞学院的纪录片作过解说。

sentences.en: She is undoubted star of British ballet.
sentences.cn: 她是英国毋庸置疑的芭蕾明星.

sentences.en: She wants to be a ballet dancer .
She was plucked from the corps de ballet to take on Juliet.
sentences.cn: 她从芭蕾舞团的伴舞队中被挖掘出来，担任朱丽叶这一角色。

sentences.en: The ballet dancer is so graceful.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞演员的姿态是如此的优美.

sentences.en: The choreography of Eric Hawkins is considered radical by ballet audiences.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞观众认为埃里克·霍金斯的舞蹈设计非常前卫。

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: Under the banner of education, we herd our children from ballet to basketball and back again.
sentences.cn: 打着教育的旗号，我们赶鸭子上架似的让孩子从芭蕾到篮球，不停地学这个学那个。

sentences.en: We’re going to the ballet tomorrow evening.
sentences.cn: 我们明天晚上要去看芭蕾舞演出。

trans.tran_cn: 芭蕾舞，芭蕾舞剧，芭蕾舞团
trans.tran_en: a performance in which dancing and music tell a story without any speaking
